8762.quoteText:
How can you edit or delete your information?

If you would like to edit your information or permanently delete your account, you can email us at support@surfshark.com.

8763.quoteText:
Does our Website respond to do-not-track signals?

At this time Surfshark does not recognize automated browser signals regarding tracking mechanisms, which may include ‘do-not-track’ instructions.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

What age do I have to be to use the Services?

Surfshark is not intended for users under the age of 18.
